a 2005 ford taurus experience

*hey, before you read, i encourage you to interact with the work here first! (or don't, it's okay)*

2023. This small, intimate, work came from an exercise in web based interaction. Scripted primarily in jquery, a 2005 ford taurus experience allows a window of digital space to capture a minute moment of action, in a momentary narrative form. In its simplicity, it speaks to the ability to craft web experiences that exist for their own intrinsic value, rather than pursuing a grand function.
